blogPost.excerpt: Trainn helps SaaS companies accelerate product adoption with product walkthrough videos and training academies for users. With better product education leads to better onboarding and decreases time to value of your product leading to higher retention.
blogPost.body: Trainn helps SaaS companies accelerate product adoption with product walkthrough videos and training academies for users. With better product education leads to better onboarding and decreases time to value of your product leading to higher retention.
blogPost.title: Trainn - A new way to create professional product walkthrough videos.
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Trainn帮助SaaS公司通过产品演练视频和用户培训学院来加速产品的应用。通过更好的产品教育，使用户更好地入职，减少产品价值的时间，从而提高用户的留存率。
localize.tagline: 一种全新的方式来制作专业的产品演练视频。

localize.description: Trainn幫助SaaS公司通過產品演練視頻和用戶培訓學院來加速產品的應用。通過更好的產品教育，使用戶更好地入職，減少產品價值的時間，從而提高用戶的留存率。
localize.tagline: 一種全新的方式來製作專業的產品演練視頻。
